reviews.review: This game is worth every single cent. The vanilla content is not that much, expect yourself to finish it in about a few days. However, there is Co-op modes and community maps that extrapolate the play time much further. Simple and well executed game that makes you think a lot sometimes.

świetna fabuła, czasami trudne zagadki których rozwiązanie zawsze mogło powodować nagłe zmiany. Polecam wszystkim!
Это лучшая игра в мире, как и первая часть этой игры
Попрыгать и полетать через стенки самое то

"I'm in space..."

This game is a masterpiece, and there's so much good to say about it. Everyone should try this game at least once. The humor in it is honestly hilarious, the writing is great, and the game play is innovative as all hell. There are twists and turns everywhere, and its just a wonderful experience all around. 10/10, and I would play this game to the moon and back, if you know what I mean.
Это самая лучшая игра в которую я играл эту игру уже прошёл 5 раз и мне до сих пор нравится Советую всем поиграть:D

1보다 더 어려움. 그래서 더 재밌었던 듯.

It's a wonderful game filled with puzzels and challenges you need to overcome and the story arc is great.

Possibly my favorite game of all time and I'm not saying that lightly. The only gaping flaw, unfortunately, is that the replay value isn't very high. Once you know the story and how to solve all the puzzles, it's done. I still play through the game on occasion, but I wish I had that Men In Black thingy to erase my mind so I could freshly experience it over and over again.
TENES UN COSO QUE TIRA PORTALES.. 10/10

The game is amazing. It takes everything I loved about the game and expounds upon it greatly. More funny dialogue, more in depth lore, way higher stakes, several new mechanics, and way more levels makes the original portal game look like a trailer for this one. I love it, can't stop playing.

Esse jogo é incrivel!! A franquia portal é excelente e conta com uma história incrivel, cheia de reviravoltas. Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei. Recomendo muito esse jogo!
Крута гра, весело грати з друзями, сюжет цікавий

A pesar de que la precuela haya sido simplona al punto de parecer un mod de HL2, este no solo da un paso gigante en cuanto a gráficos -tal vez sea por el uso de la última versión del Source en la fecha de su salida- sino, que también da un gran paso en cuanto a la duración de la campaña y la calidad de la misma. Regresan los momentos scripteados -palabra inexistente pero que queda cool- como los había en HL2 y nuevas mecánicas como los geles de salto, portales y velocidad, el piso láser y cono transportador de "cosas", GLaDOS, agrega a un nuevo personaje llamado "Wheatley" -el cual es un cretino, según GLaDOS-, un buen OST, modo cooperativo y un workshop donde conseguir mapas de la comunidad y subir los tuyos mediante la creación in-game de los mismos.

Para finalizar, si, me parece muy superior en todos los aspectos a la precuela y ni hablar de que su duración si es la de un juego normal -la precuela no duraba mas de 1h40m con mucha fuerza, este dura unas 5-7hs si sos medio lento para los puzzles-, las misiones son mas variadas y hasta duran mas.
Si tendría una queja... Sería el excesivo uso de pantallas de carga en la primera parte del juego, ya que al parecer son 3 partes, GLaDOS, Aperture, y Wheatley -No diré más para no espoilear-.
it took 7 hours for me to beat this game with my small brain.

portal 2 was the first game ive ever finished. i know that sounds weird but its hard for me to keep entertained to the point where i dont want to stop playing. even though ive had this game finished for over a year, i still find myself going back to it anytime i need a good laugh or want to think a bit. thanks valve :)

I beat the game in five hours, I thought it wasn't going to take that long but it was sooo much fun! There were parts where I struggled but eventually I figured it out. If you have been doubting if you want this game and you like puzzles then GET THE GAME! ITS THE BEST STORY GAME I'VE EVER PLAYED!
